name: Marimo
shortDescription: Run Marimo reactive notebooks in your pipeline.

Variables.Name: MARIMO_MODE
Variables.Description: Mode to run Marimo in: 'run' (read-only notebook), 'edit' (editable notebook), 'browser' (file browser)

Variables.Name: MARIMO_NOTEBOOK
Variables.Description: The notebook file to open (e.g., notebook.py)

Variables.Name: MARIMO_PASSWORD
Variables.Description: The password for connecting to Marimo (leave empty for no authentication)

Variables.Name: QUIX_PLUGIN_MODE
Variables.Description: Enable Quix plugin mode for integration with Quix streams

Variables.Name: COPY_SAMPLE_NOTEBOOK
Variables.Description: Copy sample main.py to state folder: 'if_missing' (only if not exists), 'always' (overwrite), or empty to skip
